test_info.name: Derivatives_II
test_info.subject: Derivatives_II
sections: IV. Choose the meaning of the Latin word from which the given English word is derived.
II. Choose the English word which is derived from the given Latin word.
VI. Choose the word derived from the same Latin root as the word given.
III. Identify the Latin word from which the given English word is derived.

questions.question: They were accused of parricide, the killing of a _________.
Which bird is best described as a “bone-breaker”?
His tertiary excuse for not having his homework was “the dog ate it”.
The girl’s musical talent seemed to be innate.
The judge approved the change of venue in the controversial trial.
The teacher decided to vituperate his students the next day.
The speaker’s incisive remarks were most effective.
The press always seems to impugn the candidates’ reputations.
The hastate leaf was shaped like a __________.
The legislature wanted to ameliorate the plan.
